data.title: Jose Ocasio ID'd as Mansfield man killed in Route 1 car crash in Wrentham
data.meta_description: Massachusetts State Police have identified the 50-year-old man who was killed in a car crash on Route 1 Friday evening after trying to make an abrupt U-turn.
data.text:
Massachusetts State Police have identified 50-year-old Jose Ocasio as the Mansfield man who was killed in a car crash on Route 1 in Wrentham Friday evening after trying to make an abrupt U-turn.

Troopers responded to the crash on the northbound side of the road shortly after 5:30 p.m., state police said previously. Their initial investigation indicates that Ocasio was driving a Mercedes sedan when he attempted to make an abrupt U-turn from the center travel lane. A vehicle traveling north in the leftmost travel lane then hit the sedan on the driverâ€™s side.

Read more: Mansfield man killed in car crash on Route 1 in Wrentham, state police say

Ocasio was rushed to a local hospital where he was declared dead, state police said. The other driver involved in the crash was uninjured.

State police are still investigating the crash. No further information has been released.
